name: ArnoldBeltramiChildress (dysts)
equations: ArnoldBeltramiChildress system (see dysts package for equations)
description_simple: An exact solution of Euler's equation for inviscid flow in 3D. Often referred to as the ABC flow.
description_complex: A chaotic dynamical system imported from the dysts package. This system exhibits complex, sensitive dynamics characteristic of deterministic chaos.
